s.text: Aside from the fact that the accusation is simply false--Powell strikes me as downright visionary about politics, portraying the American involvement in World War II in A Time To Be Born as a media war much like Grenada--it is yet another time-honored way of dismissing women's work.
When a first-edition Powell book goes up for auction on eBay, the same three or four of us bid; I've often thought we should join forces for some harmless price-fixing.
